--- Data ---

```{r eval = FALSE}
# tanho63/aoc.elf
aoc.elf::aoc_get(day = 10, year = 2015)
```

```{r}
input <- readLines(here::here("2015/day-10-input.txt")) |> 
  strsplit("") |> 
  unlist() |> 
  as.numeric()
```

--- Part 1 ---

```{r}
get_next_seq <- function(x){
  y <- rle(x)
  matrix(
    nrow = 2,
    c(y$lengths,y$values),
    byrow = TRUE
  ) |> 
    as.numeric()
}
x <- input
for(i in 1:40){
  x <- get_next_seq(x)
}
length(x)
```

--- Part 2 ---

```{r}
# we already did it 40 times, let's do it 10 more
for(i in 1:10){
  x <- get_next_seq(x)
}
length(x)
```
